pages.text: To make the intricate inlays in the doors and trapdoors, you will need to go through a couple of steps.  $(br2)
Let's start with some dark iron mix.$(br2) This requires some charcoal and iron nuggets.
Once you have mixed it all up, just pop it in the furnace. Now you now have Dark Iron Ingots!
Finally, the Dark Iron Inlay is crafted using the Dark Iron ingots.$(br2) Voila! You have a lovely Dark Iron Inlay for your new door!
